description: At the beginning of your turn, a single friendly COMMANDER can declare either Kauyon or Mont'ka. You can only use the Master of War ability once per battle, irrespective of how many models in your army have this ability.
* Kauyon: Until the end of the turn, you can re-roll failed hit rolls for friendly <SEPT> units within 6", but these units cannot move for any reason.
* Mont'ka: Friendly <SEPT> units within 6" can both Advance and shoot as if they hadn't moved this turn.
rules.name: Master of War
